scripts.lint:editorconfig:
npm run --silent _header -- "  ${npm_lifecycle_event}  "  && npx --ignore-existing --quiet echint && echo ' ✓ passed
'
scripts.lint:readmes:
npm run --silent _header -- "  ${npm_lifecycle_event}  "       && npm run --silent _markdownlint -- $(npx --ignore-existing --quiet glob-cli2 "{.,*,vim/mine/*}/README.md") && echo ' ✓ passed
'
scripts.lint:shell:
npm run --silent _header -- "  ${npm_lifecycle_event}  "         && shellcheck --exclude=SC1090,SC2148 --shell=sh -- shell/*.sh && echo ' ✓ passed
'
scripts.lint:bash:
npm run --silent _header -- "  ${npm_lifecycle_event}  "          && shellcheck --exclude=SC1090 --shell=bash -- $(npx --ignore-existing --quiet glob-cli2 "{bash/*,**/*.bash}") && echo ' ✓ passed
'
scripts.lint:vim:after:
npm run --silent _header -- "  ${npm_lifecycle_event}  "     && vint -- vim/after && echo ' ✓ passed
'
scripts.lint:vim:autoload:
npm run --silent _header -- "  ${npm_lifecycle_event}  "  && vint -- vim/autoload/dko* && echo ' ✓ passed
'
scripts.lint:vim:colors:
npm run --silent _header -- "  ${npm_lifecycle_event}  "    && vint -- vim/colors && echo ' ✓ passed
'
scripts.lint:vim:ftplugin:
npm run --silent _header -- "  ${npm_lifecycle_event}  "  && vint -- vim/ftplugin && echo ' ✓ passed
'
scripts.lint:vim:rc:
npm run --silent _header -- "  ${npm_lifecycle_event}  "        && vint -- $(npx --ignore-existing --quiet glob-cli2 "vim/{gvimrc,vimrc,*.vim}") && echo ' ✓ passed
'
scripts.lint:vim:mine:
npm run --silent _header -- "  ${npm_lifecycle_event}  "      && vint -- vim/mine && echo ' ✓ passed
'
scripts.lint:vim:plugin:
npm run --silent _header -- "  ${npm_lifecycle_event}  "    && vint -- vim/plugin && echo ' ✓ passed
'
